User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US) AppleWebKit/534.16 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/10.0.648.133 Safari/534.16
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110313 Firefox/4.0b13pre

When resizing the download manager window a black line is displayed on the bottom of the window (if aero on) 

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open Firefox on a clean profile 
2. Open the download manager window (ctrl+j)
3. Resize window (making it bigger) by click&drag the top margin of it.

Actual Results:  
3. While resizing the window a black line is displayed at its bottom

Expected Results:  
4. The window should be displayed without being distorted

The issue is reproducible both when hardware acceleration is on or off.
The issue is reproducible when aero theme is on
